page.title: 10Silver Jubilee (Cont)
page.content: After the celebration Mass there was a buffet lunch and social afternoon that went on late into the evening. On Wednesday June 12th at 9.30am Father celebrated his first Mass of the day. It was attended by 180 people At midday Father McDonald together with many of his fellow priests concelebrated Mass at Our Lady of Lourdes Convent, Didsbury. Father's elder brother Liam and younger sister Vivian together with their families came from Ireland to be present at these celebrations, as did his Aunt and Uncle. Other friends travelled many miles to be with Father McDonald on this day. John and Maureen Remo came from America and Father Bernard McDermott flew by Lockheed L1011 Super Tristar from Tiawan to be present.
